name: CORPSE HARVEST: Zenith Agent Berpac and the Sporbot Invasion
name_original: CORPSE HARVEST: Zenith Agent Berpac and the Sporbot Invasion
description:
IN THE DISTANT FUTURE . . . 199X . . . THE SPORBOT INVASION IS DESTROYING OUR WORLD . . .

THE ONLY ONE WHO CAN SAVE US IS YOU, ZENITH AGENT BERPAC, THE LAST LINE OF DEFENSE BETWEEN US AND DESOLATION. 

 

⌨️ WASD to move, 🖱️ left click to shoot or select.

------

🧱 Procedurally-generated stages - infinite replayability!

🕷️ Kill enemy Sporbots of multiple sizes and temperaments!

🧬 Harvest resources from defeated Sporbots! They stole them from us first, that makes it okay!

🔫 Upgrade your weapon stats for more power, faster health regeneration, and more!

⭐️ Keep your eye out for golden chests! The Sporbots keep their loot in those! Shoot ‘em until they open!

🎀 Your game, your style: choose from OVER 10 OUTFITS!
